short_summary: Seller representation real estate brokerage services inside a foreign country.
description: The purpose of this [report/publication/contract_document_etc.] is to select a supplier to enter into a contract with the Government to provide seller representation real estate brokerage services to sell/dispose of a total of [number] Crown-owned residential properties in [location], [country_name].
duration_in_months: The duration of this contract is about 13 months.
full_summary:
**Selling Real Estate Brokerage Services for the Embassy of Canada in Lima**
===========================================================

**Tender Overview**
-------------------

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is seeking a qualified supplier to provide seller representation real estate brokerage services to sell/dispose of seven Crown-owned residential properties in Lima, Peru.

**Tender Details**
------------------

*   **Title:** Selling Real Estate Brokerage Services for the Embassy of Canada in Lima
*   **Reference Number:** cb-842-30420322 (Amendment 5)
*   **Solicitation Number:** 23-240902
*   **Publication Date:** December 20, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** January 31, 2024, at 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 15, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

**Selective Qualification**
-------------------------

This Request for Proposal is conducted in accordance with the Canada-an Imperial Trade Agreement, and all eligible suppliers are invited to submit their proposals.

**Eligibility and Exclusion**
---------------------------

Suppliers must clearly demonstrate their qualifications, expertise, and a realistic understanding of the proposed services. Incomplete or non-compliant submissions are unacceptable and will not receive further consideration.

**Evaluation Criteria**
----------------------

Suppliers will be selected based on their proposed methodology, strategies, and expertise in selling residential properties. The least expensive proposal will be selected.

**Preference Price**
-------------------

Proposals will be evaluated in accordance with the least expensive price method, with the supplier offering the lowest total price being selected as the successful bidder.

**Service and Support provided to the Contracting Authority**
---------------------------------------------------

The selected supplier will be responsible for providing the following services:

*   Seller representation real estate brokerage services
*   Sale and disposal of the Crown-owned properties

**Attachments**
--------------

For tender guidance and submission requirements, please view the following attachments:

*   [RFP document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28094/23-240902---rfp.pdf)
*   [Addendum 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28094/23-240902-addendum-1_0.pdf)

For any questions or concerns, please contact:

*   **Brent Hygaard**
*   **Email:** [
